question:
At 8 am, we received news that an old woman was murdered in the building.On reaching the crime scene, the watchman told us,
“She had a disorder, once her husband asked which day it is, she said Thursday while it was Sunday. After purchasing 4 apples she gave him money +4 times r.She was 70 years old but she says she was 74 .She left a note which reads "LYWFERH"
What did she mean?”

We thought her husband was the killer but he was blind and deaf and when frisked, another note was found in his pocket.It was clear until now that someone was playing with me.
The note now said  
“Sherlock I, In a mysterious case of sudden disappearance of Mr. Schlansky, his wife consulted us. We found a laptop in his office and needs to be accessed in order to get a clue about his whereabouts but it was password protected with a hint as follows:

Take 4 pineapples and eat them with 4 toasts. If you don’t guess the password within the 3rd duck. Then eat the 1st apricot kept to the side of 1st paper guarded by 4 tigers.

Can you help us to find the password?”

It was now clear by the leads that we have to escape.
As soon as we escaped, I received an SMS, it said 

“Jorge Manley was murdered. Yet no murderer was found. But the cops got witnesses. There were 5 other people in Jorge’s house. The Chef said he was preparing breakfast. The Gardener said she was gardening. The Maid was outside cleaning the window as there was frost all over. The Wife said she was watching TV. And then the grandfather said he was in his wheelchair. Who murdered Jorge Manley?”

We tried to reach out our maid.As we landed up at her place we were added up with a kidnapping case of her daughter. The maid explained the crime scene as 

“The maid and her 3 yrs old daughter Olivia were sleeping meanwhile kidnappers came and kidnapped her daughter.In bathroom there was  glass in front of mirror and a bathtub below it .They wrote on the glass that this may help to reach you to your daughter-  “call me at n3^373”. What did the kidnappers mean?”

There was no contact number listed so we just waited for that porcelain clock on the wall to proclaim the time as ELEVEN.
We received the call.
A recorded audio was played…

“We have kept your daughter safe and sound. But if you want to see her again, do as I say.” 
They sent us to a warehouse where two address notes were kept. One was towards the north and the other was towards the east.
John Watson and I decided to split and go to those warehouses.
One who went to the north found a letter with a mathematical question in it

Question
The triangle ABC  has sides a=5, b=18.76, and c=15.398 find angle C.

Other who went to the east found the same question but had to find the angle A

After solving the problem, both of us met and thought about the clues.
Can you help us find the location?

After we went to Italy,While exiting from the airport, an officer said, “Welcome to Italy, Sherlock and John”, and gave us this letter

“Hello Sherlock and John.Actually I don’t feel like giving the daughter right away
‘A science teacher was murdered soon after his last lecture, Wednesday evening.
The murderers left a note "4.4.8.3.1.0.0.8 ".
Break the code and find the names of two murderers’ ”

After we went to the chemistry Lab owned by RuBi and Neo, we found Olivia with a lead in her hand 

“I have 2 friends, Scarlett and Erin. Scarlett lies on Mondays, Wednesdays and Fridays. Whereas Erin lies on Tuesdays, Thursdays, Saturdays. 
Today they give the following statements.
Scarlett- I lie on Saturdays.
Erin- I will lie tomorrow
Scarlett- I'll lie on Sundays as well.

Which day is today?”

The next day was Wednesday.
We sensed something strange about this lead so we interrogated the daughter about the names.
As stated by the daughter those were her friends in London
We headed back to London to provide her friends security.
But we were then informed that Erin and Scarlett went on a trek trip with their friends.

“A group of 5 friends went on an adventure. They decided to climb a mountain.It was a winter evening, they started their journey in extreme cold. Two days later, when they were starting their climb for the day, they found Scarlett's body and she was poisoned. On investigating, Joe told that he was packing the bag. Hamid said he was the last to wake up. Erin told that he was cooking food for all and Winston said that he was mapping their route for the journey
Who is most likely to be the killer?”

We handed over Erin to the Police custody.
We knew it wasn’t over but there were no new leads now.

We ran out of cash so we visited the nearby bank where we met most of the people I met on my wedding day. It seemed a bit fishy and until now everything meant to be so.
Here the time arrived 

“Four robbers Leo, Tommy, Harrison & Arlo planned to rob a bank. They entered the bank on a busy morning and sealed all entrances. One hostage was found dead. During the investigation Leo said he was breaking into the locker room. Arlo said he was looting all the cash from the cash desk. Harrison said he was guarding the entrances. Tommy said he was disabling the security cameras and alarms. Who killed the hostage?”

Now the question is was this all planned or it was just a coincidence?
Why did Harrison do it?
When interrogated he gave us a phone with a recorded audio

“Okay Sherlock, welcome to the final round.That’s enough of this game now I feel to reveal my cards to you and my real name,but but but,Let’s play one last round.

There’s a donkey murdered with a note on its tail. 
Note said “Haha sherlock,you would need an eight legged table to solve that.
Take this number you may need it,150 165 142 145 162 164”
The only way to get to the murderer is to solve the mystery note.”
